raw_text: TECHNICAL PROJECT MANAGER       Summary     I am a PMP certified marketing, technical, and research project manager. I currently work as a technical and research project manager at PMA Media Group. I have led projects that include:     User Research/Testing and Product Planning  UX Design and Graphics Design  Web Development and Technical Software Creation  Online Campaigns (Marketing Strategy and Asset Creation)  SEO, Analytics, and other data points.   ​I have a current Project Management Professional certificate and am working towards my Agile Project Management certificate and my IIBA Business Analyst certification.    I have not just lead projects, I am also experienced in production in the following areas:   Front end web-development  UX and Graphics Design for Web sites  SEO and Keyword Research  Analytics for web, social, and email        Skills          Project Management (Including Agile Methodologies)  2.5 Years of WorkFront Experience (As well as JIRA, Trello, Slack, and others)  ​Javascript, PhP, Html/Css, VBA, Multiple libraries (Jquery, Angular, etc.)  Marketing Strategy for audience definition and strategy to tactics mapping      Microsoft Office, with high proficiency in Microsoft Excel  Adobe Analytics Implementation and Measurement Proficiency   Capable of writing User Research scripts and Testing plans  Conducting Focus groups, usability tests, surveys, and other testing methods.            Work Experience      Technical Project Manager     May 2017   to   Current      Company Name   －   City  ,   State    Lead all technical projects for PMA Media Group and it's AU credit card division. This includes both internal and client facing technical solution creation--From finance department tools creation to client facing web services creation.     I have also started to help PMA Media implement a scrum process for all technical development, with an agile approach to user discovery.        Project Manager - Digital Marketing/Web     Aug 2014   to   May 2017      Company Name   －   City  ,   State    Lead projects that included:   Web Development and Website Content Creation  User Research/Analytics/Testing/SEO  UX Design and Graphics Design  Campaign Marketing Strategy and Asset Creation   This included the management of the creation of many of FamillySearch.org's campaigns; including Pioneer campaign, Meet my Grandma, Freedmen's Bureau and more.        Digital Media Analyst     Jan 2014   to   Jul 2014      Company Name   －   City  ,   State    Worked with clients to determine Business Requirements and KPIs for their digital products. We would create measurement strategies for their websites, apps, email campaigns, and social channels. This was mostly done in Adobe Analytics, ClickTale, and Localytics, but sometimes in Google Analytics as well.    This included both report creation as well as code implementation.        Content Publisher and Front End Developer     Sep 2013   to   Jan 2014      Company Name   －   City  ,   State   Working with clients and an in house content management system, I would create web pages with some custom style. I would also collaborate on marketing strategy behind each page being created.       Language Technical Writer     Mar 2013   to   Sep 2013      Company Name   －   City  ,   State   I translated Finnish language bank documents to English and created simple web pages out of them using HTML/CSS and some JavaScript.       Accomplishments    Project Management Professional Certification - March 2016      Project Highlights       RootsTech.org:  https://www.rootstech.org/ (Project Management, Marketing Strategy, Agile Based Sprint Workflow)   ​Freedmen's Bureau Campaign:  http://www.discoverfreedmen.org/ (Project Management, Marketing Strategy)   Multiple Sections on Lds.org and FamilySearch.org:  https://www.lds.org/?lang=eng, https://familysearch.org/
story:
Let me transform that resume into a story:

Meet a versatile technical project manager whose professional journey is a blend of technology, marketing, and research. Currently steering projects at PMA Media Group, they've earned their stripes with a PMP certification and are actively pursuing additional credentials in Agile Project Management and Business Analysis.

Their story begins with an interesting role as a Language Technical Writer, translating Finnish bank documents to English - a position that combined linguistic skills with basic web development. From there, they evolved into a Content Publisher and Front-End Developer, where they began crafting web pages and diving into marketing strategy.

Their career took a more analytical turn when they became a Digital Media Analyst, working with clients to establish business requirements and KPIs for digital products. This role helped them master various analytics platforms like Adobe Analytics and Google Analytics.

The next chapter saw them step into project management at a major genealogy organization, where they led significant web development projects and marketing campaigns. Some of their proudest achievements include the Pioneer campaign, Meet my Grandma, and the Freedmen's Bureau project. During this period, they honed their skills in everything from UX design to SEO optimization.

Today, as a Technical Project Manager at PMA Media Group, they're leading all technical projects for both internal operations and client-facing solutions. They've been instrumental in implementing scrum processes and bringing an agile approach to user discovery.

Their toolkit is impressive: 2.5 years of WorkFront experience, proficiency in various programming languages, and expertise in project management tools like JIRA and Trello. They're equally comfortable writing user research scripts, conducting focus groups, or diving deep into Adobe Analytics.

Notable projects in their portfolio include RootsTech.org and the Freedmen's Bureau Campaign, showcasing their ability to manage complex technical projects while maintaining a strong marketing focus.

This is the story of a professional who has successfully bridged the gap between technical implementation and strategic planning, continuously evolving to meet the changing demands of digital project management.
